annotations.kubernetes.io/limit-ranger: LimitRanger plugin set: cpu request for init container wait-frontend

env.name: ISTIO_METAJSON_ANNOTATIONS
env.value: {"kubernetes.io/limit-ranger":"LimitRanger plugin set: cpu request for init container wait-frontend"}

command: set -x;  apk add --no-cache curl && until timeout -t 2 curl -f "http://${FRONTEND_ADDR}"; do echo "waiting for http://${FRONTEND_ADDR}"; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-frontend
